name: StayWoke
0:
”Alexa, open stay woke”
”Alexa, start stay woke”
”Alexa, ask stay woke for a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stay woke
des:
Ask Alexa for an interesting fact or piece of information about African American history. The list of facts vary from learning about historical figures to finding resources such as books written by and including main characters of color. When using this skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next fact. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
